sys_hub_action_type_definition.description:
This action retrieves folder ID for the given folder name from Box account of the associated credentials.

Inputs:

  • Folder Path - The complete path of the folder which user want to search. E.g. Incidents/Incident101/.
  • As User - As-User can be used by admins, co-admins to impersonate another user while executing an API request. ID of the user with which Lookup operation to be achieved.

Outputs:

  • Status - Will be set to "Success" if the request succeeds or "Error" if a failure occurs.
  • Error Message - Will be populated when the status is "Error".
  • Folder ID - ID of the folder. Will be populated in case of success.

Error Messages:

  • Invalid username or password/token.
  • Entered User ID is invalid.
  • Folder path doesn't exist.
  • The credentials associated with the Box Spoke connection does not have enough permission to perform this action.

It takes more than 10 minutes for a new folder created in Box to be searchable, so this action will not return results immediately for newly created folder. Use this action for existing folder that has been created earlier and is older than 10 minutes.

To use this action, the corresponding Box connection and credential must be created and associated with the Box Connection & Credential alias. Learn More

Note: Requires a subscription for production use. Read More.

sys_hub_action_type_snapshot.description:
This action retrieves folder ID for the given folder name from Box account of the associated credentials.

Inputs:

  • Folder Path - The complete path of the folder which user want to search. E.g. Incidents/Incident101/.
  • As User - As-User can be used by admins, co-admins to impersonate another user while executing an API request. ID of the user with which Lookup operation to be achieved.

Outputs:

  • Status - Will be set to "Success" if the request succeeds or "Error" if a failure occurs.
  • Error Message - Will be populated when the status is "Error".
  • Folder ID - ID of the folder. Will be populated in case of success.

Error Messages:

  • Invalid username or password/token.
  • Entered User ID is invalid.
  • Folder path doesn't exist.
  • The credentials associated with the Box Spoke connection does not have enough permission to perform this action.

It takes more than 10 minutes for a new folder created in Box to be searchable, so this action will not return results immediately for newly created folder. Use this action for existing folder that has been created earlier and is older than 10 minutes.

To use this action, the corresponding Box connection and credential must be created and associated with the Box Connection & Credential alias. Learn More

Note: Requires a subscription for production use. Read More.
